Name: Smoop Can't Sleep!
About the game: Blast your way through a variety of enemies and environmental hazards as you rebuild Smoop's former power and beat the intruders back to the surface -- all in the name of a good millennia's sleep. Earn gems by defeating enemies, exploring, and completing level challenges to build your collection of skins for the ultimate wizard to don in battle. Do you take on the challenges to unlock the revered Golden Smoop, or do you fight to be the fastest Smoop there ever was?
